website_summaries.verdict: iCoffee's brewer does an acceptable job, but it doesn't live up to its performance claims, and that makes it difficult to recommend.
pros: The iCoffee Opus Single Serve Brewer sports a flashy design and promises to work with all kinds of K-style cups
cons: iCoffee isn't as feature-rich as other brewers we've tested, and despite iCoffee's claims, we weren't able to detect an uptick in coffee quality

customer_reviews.title: We Love It - Here's Why
customer_reviews.text: It takes getting used to - not having coffee filters anymore and having to dump out the grounds from the gold filter - and it's worth it! Not only are we putting less of a footprint on earth - it makes a great cup of coffee! In fact, now when we buy coffee from coffee shops and brew it at home it tastes just like theirs! Bonus - the music at the beginning and end. We love this silly thing. Honestly - I think the quality of the brew is better than those pour over single serves and the brew process (which you can watch in the window) really does eliminate the acidic taste somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS! Worked great and made great coffee for about 2 weeks, then it started blowing coffee and grounds all over the kitchen! No customer support to be found anywhere. I threw it in the trash where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: DanKellyPhoto

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COFFEE - TERRIBLE SERVICE FROM COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: It makes great coffee. The best coffee of any coffee maker I've ever owned. But the company does not support it or get back to you if you have a problem. I bought one on May 1st of this year and last week, November 3, it began leaking coffee all over the floor. It's too late to return it to Amazon and the company has not responded to inquiries about any kind of warranty. I wrote them through Amazon and they never responded.
customer_reviews.author: Shadoe Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Decent coffee
customer_reviews.text: Decent coffee maker, only downside is having no replacement parts available. The mesh filter is a pain to clean, and being made of the usual thin plastic, has proven to be easily broken 😢. Update 10 months in : Unexplained shut offs mid cycle becoming more frequent, the “chrome look” finish beginning to peel off the plastic body. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brownson

customer_reviews.title: Coffee tastes great now
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were right. No more acidity to the coffee when brewed this way. The steam process is unique. I find the flavor is smoother to taste. I used to drink 1/2 a cup in the mornings due to the acidity and now I drink two and they go down fast. Very happy with this Remington I Coffee maker. I don't know if there are any more out there but it is worth it to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Regular and tedious
customer_reviews.text: Even it's a fun coffee making processing to watch, the quality of dripping one is the same I have found in another ones. Cleaning it requires more time because the mesh funnel has to be emptied very carefully and it's always coffee grounds inside it after you scooped out most of them. The rest goes into the drainage which,if you runs on septic system as in my case,you are not supposed to be putting them on the drain. Additionally there is always a little bit of brew coffee inside where the funnel rest
customer_reviews.author: A. castle

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Coffee Maker.
customer_reviews.text: This makes the best cup/pot of coffee I have ever tasted, and I have been drinking coffee for over forty years. Some reviewers have complained about the cleaning process, but using the sprayer on your kitchen sink makes it a breeze. It even makes an excellent pot of decaf coffee, and that is always a hard one for a drip type coffee maker. I have yet had a pot of coffee from this maker that was bitter or harsh. It makes the smoothest coffee ever. Adding the right amount of coffee grinds is important, and I have found that I can get by with less than what I normally use in a regular drip style pot.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Braman

customer_reviews.title: it is good, and other times it can be bland
customer_reviews.text: The coffee from this machine is inconsistent. Sometimes, it is good, and other times it can be bland. I use a burr grinder and fresh beans daily and brew 4-6 cups on average. Twice, it has turned off mid-brew for no reason, ruining the pot of coffee. A surprising amount of coffee water sits in the machine after every brew requiring constant blotting out and wiping every day. I bought this coffee maker on CR's recommendation, but would not have done so in hindsight. I expected more from this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Straka

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this! We bought it for better flavor and ...
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this! We bought it for better flavor and boy does it deliver! It is a little more complicated to clean because of the permanent filter, but it's environmental friendliness was one of the draws for us. We don't mind the rinsing of the filters one bit. I did a lot of research before buying and appreciate the great taste over all the bells and whistles of some of the other brands. I just had an electronic coffee pot burn up after ten years of use. It was convenient, but didn't deliver coffee that tasted anywhere near as good as this.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa E Myers

customer_reviews.title: I love the coffee and the concept of this maker
customer_reviews.text: I love the coffee and the concept of this maker. The only issue I have is the hassle of the coffee ground removal. Since there is no filter, to empty is a bit of a challenge. I remove it from the maker and let it dry so I can empty. There is always an amount remaining which I rinse down my disposal which is not ideal but since it is such a small amount, I am ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Schlagenhauff

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: We bought the recommended coffee grind of #9 yet on the 3rd pot of coffee it started "spitting" which is where the coffer brew container pops up under pressure and spits coffee grinds and water around the counter top. Seems impossible to find the Remington web site or the warranty information. DO NOT BUY Update: coffee maker took a hour to brew 8 of 12 cups. Not only did it spit but there is apparently an internal leak after only 3 months of usage. Called their phone number. Would not let you wait for support but referred you to a full voice mail box and hung up. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee brewer I've ever experienced.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best coffee I have ever had. I like using this just as much as getting my clover produced cup of coffee from starbucks. It does a wonderful job mixing the concept of a drip coffee machine and a french press. you get the best of both worlds. The great thing is it can make either a great 12 cup batch of coffee or an equally amazing 4 cup!
customer_reviews.author: isaiah17_7

customer_reviews.title: More flavor and more natural oils!
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of them. On the first one, I did not follow the instructions—I used fine grind rather than medium grind. So, I replaced it with a new one since it is now cheaper. The brewing process is different—the water is in contact with the coffee longer. As a consequence, more natural oils come out of the bean, and the coffee has a mellower flavor. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Don C.

customer_reviews.title: Makes better coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one coffee maker I've ever used that really makes a difference. The taste is noticeably smoother (and better for it, in my opinion). I had to subtract a star, though, because it turns off and stops keeping the coffee hot just two hours after it stops brewing. If that's long enough for you, then add the star back on. My old CuisineArt coffee maker (after my second one failed after just a few years, I gave up on that model) allowed me to program the amount of time it would continue to keep the coffee hot, up to four hours.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Abbott

customer_reviews.title: It really brews better coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using a good drip coffee maker for some time. I use freshly ground good quality arabica coffee. On a recent trip the countries I visited had french press coffee as the standard. It tasted noticeably better than my own - jealousy! I read Consumer Reports' review of iCoffee and decided to buy it. Great call! It makes an incredibly great tasting brew! The old drip machine is now cleaned up and stored in the basement as a back-up to make decaf at our next party. All I can ask about iCoffee is "why did it take so long to invent?"
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Marc

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Great flavor Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Inexpensive Great flavor Cons: Periodically, mine will turn off the burner immediately when it's done brewing, instead of staying on for two hours. The red light just goes off. Even when the burner works properly, it's limited to two hours Messy day-to-day maintenance because you can't use disposable filters with it
customer_reviews.author: TechnoMack

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee if you can wait 10 minutes and don't mind cleaning up coffee grounds & sediment.  Wait for the 2.0 version
customer_reviews.text: We love our DaVinci single cup brewer so we ordered this when our Bunn died after 3 faithful years of service. It does give a smooth tasting cup of coffee however it takes 10 minutes to make a pot, leaves a lot--not a little--sediment in the pot and each cup of coffee, it's very noisy while brewing, and it's a pain to clean the grounds out of the large, oddly shaped basket. We are sending it back and ordering another Bunn. There is a secondary filter that reduces the sediment that makes it too the pot but it reduces the taste of the coffee and it's also a pain to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: 03fxdwg

customer_reviews.title: Unreplaceable Filter
customer_reviews.text: This makes good coffee and is easy to use. However, it is very difficult to clean, the filter has grooves and crannies that the grounds cling too. The worst thing though is the filter is unique to this maker and the manufacturer appears to be out of business. The web site doesn’t work, the phone is a recording that disconnects and even snail mail comes back. If you own one of these, treat the filter well because if it breaks you are in the market for a new coffee maker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE ANY iCoffee product
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE an ICoffee product! I purchased this in November 2016 and it failed exactly one year later to the day. iCoffee does not respond to their telephone number-only a recording saying no replacement units are available anymore. Their web site appears defunct so I assume the company is out of business. (try calling 661-257-0810 or try them at iCoffee.com). I assume anyone buying one of their products at this point will get a worthless warranty. Even though they have Remington on the product they are unaffiliated with that brand.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend this pot
customer_reviews.text: Less than 5 months from purchase and we had to replace the decanter because it is very fragile and shattered when placed on a quartz countertop and now the whole machine is broken. It is stuck on "heating water" mode and won't produce coffee. Of course, we can't return it bc there is only a 30 return policy. What a waste of $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The double filter system and the spin ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this coffee maker back in April of 2015. I love it. The double filter system and the spin technology gives you a great cup of coffee. I use it daily and love the sound and lights..I give it 5 stars because of the great taste of the coffee no matter which brand I use. but u pour in 12 cups and you get back 10 cups...no matter a great cup of coffee...beautiful design...looks great on counter top...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Graziano

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: After drinking AeroPress coffee for over ten years, we've found a coffeemaker that produces a very good cup. The iCoffee by Remington makes an excellent cup. We drink a heavy body, rich Indonesian coffee because it is low in acid, naturally. This iCoffee produces a smoothe cup full of flavor. Easy clean up and simple operation.
customer_reviews.author: RayC

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This machine produces coffee that is better than my French press and it is faster, cleaner, and easier to use. The extra filter that snaps into the pot makes the coffee smooth and rich, never bitter. An I Coffee is my favorite gift to give the coffee lovers in my family!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: problem
customer_reviews.text: box came rather banged up and although it was a previously used coffee maker i was surprised that the filter wasn,t even properly cleaned. could at least put in a new filter. like icoffee maker. this is my 3rd one. always bought new but about every 18 months something goes wrong and i need to replace. richard hofmann actiongarbage@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Good cup o' joe
customer_reviews.text: It makes very good coffee - we use a drip maker and a french press - this tastes like french press. Other reviewers have mentioned losing water - adding 8 cups water and getting 7 cups of coffee - I have had the same experience and I think the water must be lost during the steam brewing. I didn't find the clean up more arduous than any other process (except Keurig). I wish that it fit under cabinets - it's pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought two of these and neither lasted a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and neither lasted a year. Daily use: once a day, 6 cups. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Singer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes a helluva cup of coffee! Just remember to turn the strainer upside down to clean the jets
customer_reviews.author: Mycque

customer_reviews.title: good cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: makes good coffee---but I can't find a place to buy another carafe--to make 2 pots to serve more people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow, noisy, sludgy, and explosive.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got was broken and I had to send it back. I should have stopped there. This coffee maker is slow and noisy and gets clogged up after every use. The lid pops open because of the pressure inside. You put in 12 cups of water and you get 10 cups of coffee if you're lucky. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept, Flawed Design, Dont Waste Your Time
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, flawed design. Regardless of coffee ground size, water/steam jets constantly clog. When the iCoffee does brew a pot, dark roast coffee is delicious. I'm going to stick with a French press and/or syphon press for a better cup of joe. Don't be fooled by the crema pitch, a French press and/or syphon press has a layer of crema too.
customer_reviews.author: D.Brunick

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee maker with one big weakness
customer_reviews.text: Coffee maker spins water so thoroughly that coffee grounds are spread throughout the brewed coffee, making a mess to clean up unless one likes to drink grounds - I don't. The maker is quite solid and brews fast enough for me, but overall there is more mess and time wasted than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Gould from NY

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee, reasonable price, excellent design & fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this coffee maker because a respected consumer organization recommended it. I was not disappointed I can make a strong cup without bitterness. And with the Mozart tune at beginning and end plus the LED light made it fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes great coffee. I use less coffee than I did ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes great coffee. I use less coffee than I did with my other coffee maker. Also the sediment basket is a good feature. It prevents the bitter taste that can happen when coffee ground sediments settle at the bottom of the pot/cup.
customer_reviews.author: jacquie j.

customer_reviews.title: Plus the added carafe filter is great, but I don't use it
customer_reviews.text: The coffee that is brewed is very smooth, not bitter, and I only find minimal grounds at the end of the brew, as long as you grind the beans slightly coarse. Plus the added carafe filter is great, but I don't use it...Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Everything we were looking for in a coffee maker. We did not want the water heater on all the time but a good cup of coffee quickly. Because the grounds are swirled, we have cut the amount of coffee used. It is also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ann Rogers

customer_reviews.title: enjoyed the coffee
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the coffee maker in November 2016; worked OK, enjoyed the coffee. However, now in February 2018 it will not operate. The trouble shooting guidance did not resolve the problem. Unable to find a customer service website for additional assistance. With hindsight, I would not purchase this coffee maker again.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker !!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker makes wonderful tasting coffee. I think it may even be better than a french press, which is what I have used previously. It is a lot easier to clean than a french press. I also enjoy the Mozart tune that tells you when the coffee is ready. I am a coffee nut and particular about my home brew. This is the best coffee maker for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Messy and Complicated
customer_reviews.text: I am changing my review. My husband still likes it but he has to put a heavy tea kettle on top to keep the basket in place so it will brew. Sometimes it spits out a mess of grounds. Other times the "straws" that squirt out water inside the basket become clogged with grounds. Cleaning them is a procedure too. I don;t like the coffee as much as I used to, but my coffee loving husband swears by it and won't give it up.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My coffee maker is a little over a month old and it no longer produces any more than 2 cups then stops. I attempted to lift the lid to move the water with a wooden spoon and when I opened the top I got a steam burn on my hand. Trying to contact the maker but no luck
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Mandell

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again nor recommend. Even using coarse french press grind and with ...
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again nor recommend. Even using coarse french press grind and with the extra filter for the carafe, the coffee was full of sediment. The coffee maker died after 13 months of use. When I bought the coffee maker it was fairly expensive, but would have been worth the price if it made a good cup of coffee. It did not.
customer_reviews.author: SURA

customer_reviews.title: No customer support!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought an this machine four months ago, quit working last week, message from iCoffee was not replaceable, return to seller. Too late to return, guess I lose!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee taste
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee pot. I have the single serve so to take coffee to work bought this. Icoffee has the best tasting coffee. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wallace

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 45 days and past the time I could return it. The water would not empty from the
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if there was a way to turn the warmer plate back. The warmer plate shuts off after two hours. You can't just turn it back on, it's either heat it up in a microwave or make another pot. Ended up sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: Husband is very happy with the coffee though
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that it is difficult to clean out the coffee grinds. Also the reservoir is quite large. Husband is very happy with the coffee though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is smooth, but there is a lot of leftover drudge in the pot and additional filter. The warmer pad is not great and the coffee is only warm after 15-20 minutes. It doesn't take paper filters, so cleaning the filter takes some time. As a single person, I would not advise this for the morning coffee maker choice.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets clogged easily and now you can’t find any replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Parmely

customer_reviews.title: this is great, not fun or easy to clean but coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: this is great, not fun or easy to clean but coffee comes alive through this brew process and has more zing !
customer_reviews.author: QJC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Second try at this coffee maker, first started leaking after about a year. We like the coffee taste and concept, however Second try leaked at the 30 day mark. I give up,do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb first Brew!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well this is only my first brew, but this may be the best cup of coffee that I have ever brewed at home. If it's durable, and last longer than my Mr. Coffee I will be fully satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Watts

customer_reviews.title: No warranty support and dangerous
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months the top would blow off spewing scalding hot coffee all over the counter. After 6 months it quit brewing altogether, There is no company now for warranty - they don't exist. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L. Mackie

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Coffee meets the French Press
customer_reviews.text: It may make an odd mechanical snore when brewing, but you won't care! This makes the best coffee you will ever drink, easy peasy. Plays Mozart when it's ready (yes, you can turn it off). Yum yum yum. What a genius I am to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Babzter

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We love this coffee maker. It makes an awesome, smooth cuppa joe. Yes. It's a bit of a pain to clean, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Best: using less coffee for a very smooth drink
customer_reviews.text: Best: using less coffee for a very smooth drink. Worst: Not really a worst, takes a few extra steps to clean after each use but for me is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Russell

customer_reviews.title: Makes a wonderful cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Makes a wonderful cup of coffee, probably the best I have ever drank. A little time consuming to clean but I love the end result so much that its well worth it. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants a great cup of coffee, thats why I gave it a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I'm lovin' it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee maker ever. I've had them all over the years too. This one makes the BEST cup of coffee you ever drank. Couldn't even tell that the coffee was plain old Mrs. Olson's Folgers. No bitterness. THE BEST. Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M. Olson

customer_reviews.title: iCoffee brews very good coffee. The only negative is that
customer_reviews.text: iCoffee brews very good coffee. The only negative is that, because it doesn't use throw-away filters, cleaning the grinds from the permanent filter is a bit of a chore. But the effort is worth it for the tasty coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. Used to use a French press, and this is very convenient. If you grind the beans coarsely, it gives you the French Press taste.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Reduction of bitterness and acidity was pronounced
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Reduction of bitterness and acidity was pronounced. Consumer Reports rated it at the top!.....This innovative brewing design actually works!!
customer_reviews.author: D. F. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Makes great tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Makes great tasting coffee. Tastes like french press brew. Has 2 filters, one for the ground beans and another final filter that gets 99% of the sediment that often goes with french press coffee. Brew mechanism works quickly. Carafe pours easily with no spilling or running down the side.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Makes the very best coffee that I have ever used in a home ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes the very best coffee that I have ever used in a home coffee maker; It also is economical as it uses less coffee. There is no bitterness & makes an ordinary brand taste like a superior brand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Happy connoiseur
customer_reviews.text: Switched from a Keurig to this machine. Very simple and easy to use and definitely a cost savings. I generally brew one 12 cup pot a day of a darker roast and can attest to the fact that I hardly use any coffee. For anyone new trying it I would recommend using half of what you normally would then adjust from there, and if you don't like mud in the bottom of your cup then consider another machine.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: ... out of the filter basket but other wise makes good coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get the used grinds out of the filter basket but other wise makes good coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: I had one for five years It stopped working Liked it so much Got another one
customer_reviews.text: I had one for five years It stopped working Liked it so much Got another one. The steam technology makes the coffee really hot and the filter in the carafe takes out the after taste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, especially for larger amounts of brewed coffee
customer_reviews.text: It is obviously a very good coffee maker; however, I have yet to tell if the flavor is really better to a French press pot that costs a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee maker !!!! I use 3 scoops of coffee to 6 cups of water and it is perfect. I prepare the night before and simply start the coffee in the AM. with the delightful tune. Worth the money !!!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Auto French Press
customer_reviews.text: Coffee tastes great. Cleaning it is different than normal but not bad at all. It really does take a lot of the bitterness out of the coffee, which is great. I just describe it to my friends as my auto French press. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Madison H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: This pot makes great coffee. Better than a chemex. It is a pain in the rear to clean and it is noisy, but worth it if you want a really good cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: MargoS

customer_reviews.title: It makes great coffee, never bitter
customer_reviews.text: The Icoffee was delivered promptly. It makes great coffee, never bitter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: A must have in your kitchen!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee pot it makes the beat cup of coffee you will ever make at home!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah81

customer_reviews.title: OVER-RATED
customer_reviews.text: over rated. coffee takes good but not great. I grind my beans and I have to work hard to keep the grind coarse. the silt in the pot and my cup eventually wore me out. iCoffee now sits comfortably on a shelf in my garage. went back to my old brewer.
customer_reviews.author: dennis l brooks

customer_reviews.title: Better than most machines that I've used.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good machine and makes a good cup of coffee. It's more work to clean than most machines. We get a kick out of the few bars of Mozart that it plays when the coffee is done. I wish that we could adjust the time it keeps the coffee warm after it is brewed. It is set for two hours. Our old machine allowed us to adjust that time and make it a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: stevess

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee if you don't mind sludge in your cup and difficulty with cleaning,.
customer_reviews.text: just threw out this coffee maker which stopped working after only one year even though it was used only once a day. Admit that it made great coffee and used less coffee than other coffeemakers but was very difficult to clean because of the "spines" inside the basket. Also left an unappetizing layer of sludge at the bottom of the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: This machine keeps the coffee hot! It is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine keeps the coffee hot! It is very user friendly. I purchased it for my 80 year old father and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bundick

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee at home in a long time
customer_reviews.text: We love the coffee this makes, note it really works best with coarse ground coffee, so you can't just buy preground, you have to grind it in the store or at home.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McLeod

customer_reviews.title: coffee grinds
customer_reviews.text: great coffee but cleaning out the basket is a pain vs paper filters any ideas
customer_reviews.author: james s krasnow

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Have had the icoffee for two weeks. Great cup of coffee, very smooth, I recommend it. Clean up is not a deal breaker, only slightly more effort than cleaning a Mr. Coffee.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Moughan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, the recipient loves it! Makes very smooth coffee. She also loves the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes as smooth as the routine french press. This is much easier and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious Steam Brew Technology!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best coffee maker I've owned. If you love coffee, you're going to love this coffee maker. The new steam brew technology blows my mind every time I brew a new batch. The coffee tastes great and the coffee maker overall is a pleasure to see in action. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: 12 Cup Steam Brew
customer_reviews.text: Steam Brew, and has classy tune to tell you its working, great coffee, like French Press but with less effort
customer_reviews.author: theedgeg

customer_reviews.title: Coffee is absolutely delicious! Clean up is time consuming ...
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is absolutely delicious! Clean up is time consuming especially after using pods for years but the taste of the coffee is worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Ellie G.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this coffee maker. It stopped working after just a few uses, and we sent it back
customer_reviews.author: soapy NC

customer_reviews.title: For high end coffee, brew temp is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: For high end coffee, brew temp is a little hot. I suggest adding a couple of ice cubes to the finished pot and immediately rermoving it from the burner, so as to capture the volatiles that this machine superiorly extracts
customer_reviews.author: D. Bartos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes great tasting coffee in part because of the super-heated water which is swirled through the grounds.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Crosby

customer_reviews.title: BEST DANG COFFEE IVE HAD - EASY TO CLEAN -
customer_reviews.text: I got this based on the reviews ive read. makes the coffee taste smooth. uses Less coffee per serving. I used one TABLESPOON of coffee per serving cup before this machine and AFTER i now use one TEASPOON. buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Longfellow Peppertooth

customer_reviews.title: I loved this coffee maker but
customer_reviews.text: I loved this coffee maker but, alas, it suddenly just stopped working. The machine is not heating up the water so nothing is being steamed.
customer_reviews.author: Lola1113

customer_reviews.title: iCoffee
customer_reviews.text: After reading several other reviews on the iCoffee I was a little concerned that cleanup and quality of beverage would disappoint. True, it does take a minute or two to wash the gold filter after each pot is brewed. True, the coffee is a little cloudy (I have not elected to use the secondary filter basket which might reduce or eliminate the clouds.) Generally I am pleased with the product and its performance. I do find the mini concert of electronic music tedious. Perhaps there is a way to reprogram it to beep instead of playing classical music.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Clogs constantly Or takes forever to ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Clogs constantly Or takes forever to brew. Warranty support unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dapper

customer_reviews.title: Mozart and Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker I've ever enjoyed having! Love the Mozart played at beginning and end of brewing cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Short

customer_reviews.title: Not what it's cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: The bottom line I guess is that I don't like coffee made this way. The French press method leaves a coffee grind aftertaste, even though extra filtered.
customer_reviews.author: Martha J Batten

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I really liked the coffee it brews so I ordered a new ...
customer_reviews.text: This was our second iCoffee Steam Brew Coffee Maker. The first one lasted 14 months. My wife and I really liked the coffee it brews so I ordered a new one to replace it. We did not order it from the original source because they did not respond to an email concerning the failure of the first one. I recommend this coffee maker for anyone that particularly likes black coffee; however I also recommend that you be very kind and gentle to the screen baskets. The gold basket was the failure (I discovered after I ordered the new one) of the first coffee maker. A replacement basket costs half the price of a new coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Indy45

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't notice a difference in coffee taste. Not very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: ... it to my sister and brother in-law and they love it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my sister and brother in-law and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Larrance

customer_reviews.title: misleading advertising
customer_reviews.text: The machine needs lots of cleaning after every cup and I did not notice any difference in the coffee they claim you would use less coffee bean but I found it using more Drip filter coffee is simpler and no dirt to clean just through it when you finish Their advertising is miss leading
customer_reviews.author: Jabber

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: Good tasting coffee, but the filter is a little difficult to clean. Don't think it's a good idea to put coffee grounds down the drain and this is what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This pot really reduces the bitterness and acidity of coffee. The design allows me to thoroughly clean out any coffee grounds that get in the water reservoir, ensuring a fresh taste with each pot.
customer_reviews.author: Joycelyn Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: not what it is cracked up to be
customer_reviews.text: we were disappointed in this purchase. As mentioned by others, it is difficult to clean; we are not clean freaks, but the design of the filter basket makes it hard to clean rapidly and throughly. The biggest drawback is the heated carafe. The initial cup is good, but any subsequent cups taste burnt if coffee lingers at all in the carafe. Nothing significant enough to return, just not good enough to justify the advertising hype. We are back to using our old Zojirushi (sp?) coffee maker. -- the coffee tastes much better, and th thermal carafe keeps offee warm without "burning" it.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker makes the smoothest tasting cup of coffee you will ever have!
customer_reviews.author: Turnpike

customer_reviews.title: I Coffee by Remington
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker! Not at all hard to clean! Really brings out the flavor in any coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

product_meta.title: iCoffee RCB100 12 Cup Coffee Maker With Steam Brew Technology, Black
product_meta.description: RCB100-BC12 Features: -All iCoffee SpinBrewTM Technology single serve brewers use jets to spin, steam and stir your favorite coffee inside every K-Cup®, OneCupTM, RealCupTM capsule plus all private label K-compatible cups, creating a mini French Press-like effect that unlocks the flavor and provides coffee lovers with Impossibly SmoothTM taste.. -iCupTM Reusable, included as a bonus with every machine to brew your favorite ground coffee or loose tea. -SafetyLockTM locks the brew head during brewing, protecting consumers. -Brews in less than a minute (based on 10 oz. +/- 20%) . -Removable drip tray accepts most travel mugs. -BPA free. Product Type: -Percolators. Color: -Black. Material: -Plastic. Number of Items Included: -2. Pieces Included: -Coffee maker, carafe. Generic Specifications: -1100 W. -120 VAC. -60 Hz. Dimensions: Overall Height - Top to Bottom: -16.75". Overall Width - Side to Side: -12.25". Overall Depth - Front to Back: -10". Overall Product Weight: -6.75 lbs.
feature_bullets: Features Steam brew technology which uses hot water, steam and rotational stirring to create the smoothest coffee
Programmable and has an automatic shut off feature
Contains gold tone filter - never use paper filters again
Visible brewing window allows you to watch action as coffee brews - pause and serve function as well

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars396 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
